title: NPCI connectivity with C-Edge Technologies re-established
description: “The impact was limited to C-Edge systems hosted in their data center and not on any of the co-operative banks or regional rural banks' own infrastructure,” NPCI said. “The services of co-operative banks and regional rural banks, which were dependent on C-Edge, have now been restored.”
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
cleaned_content: you can now subscribe to our economic times whatsapp channel
